title: [BUG] ArgumentNullException is thrown when decode an image from stream on Linux Docker
body:
**Description**

ArgumentNullException is thrown when decode an image from stream. The same image can be successfully decoded from file.

**Code**

```cs
using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(File.ReadAllBytes("/temp/problem.Jpeg")))
{
    SkiaSharp.SKBitmap bmp = SkiaSharp.SKBitmap.Decode(ms);
}
```

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  The issue is reproducible starting from 2.80.3 version.
- Last known good version:  2.80.2
- IDE:   Visual Studio
- Platform Target Frameworks: 
  - Linux:  checked in docker.
 
Sample project with dockerfile and image are in the attachment.
[Temp.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/7441251/Temp.zip)
one more problematic image
[out_0.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/7441372/out_0.zip)
and one more
[problem_1.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/7441439/problem_1.zip)
